feed.title: Eurotas - Running Shoes, Sports Shoes & Clothes Shopify Theme

author.name: Eurotas - Running Shoes, Sports Shoes & Clothes Shopify Theme

entry.title: POD-S3.1 Shoes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eurotas
Type: Men's Originals
Price: 100.00

POD-S3.1 Shoes

High-tech shoes that mix modern materials for flexible support. The P.O.D. System is reborn from the archives with new levels of comfort, flexibility and design. These shoes have a knit upper that gently hugs your foot for a sock-like feel. An elastic bungee on the tongue and TPU 3-Stripes give them a high-tech look.

P.O.D. System

This redo of a '90s-era design modular midsole combines high-rebound EVA in the forefoot and Boost in the heel while TPU in the midfoot offers torsional support for comfort with every stride.

Endless Energy

Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever, delivering incredible energy return: The more energy you give, the more you get.

Authentic '90s style A chunky midsole and archive-inspired design nod back to vintage looks.
